entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is described as a pale, frozen figure in the drawing room. ("of the pale, frozen figures of Narcissa and Draco")

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is described as a pale, frozen figure in the drawing room. ("of the pale, frozen figures of Narcissa and Draco")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron's hair is described as a streak of red. ("a streak of red that was Ron’s hair")

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix's knife is described as flying across the room. ("as Bellatrix’s knife ﬂew across the room at the place where he was vanishing")

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill and Fleur are mentioned as owners of Shell Cottage. ("Bill and Fleur’s . . . Shell Cottage . . .")

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as owner of Shell Cottage. ("Bill and Fleur’s . . . Shell Cottage . . .")

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby's hand is described as jerking in Harry's. ("Gryﬃndor’s sword bumping against his back: Dobby’s hand jerked in his")

entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: Malfoy Manor is mentioned as a location. ("474 Malfoy Manor")

entities.name: gryffindor's sword
entities.description: Gryffindor's sword is described as bumping against Harry's back. ("Gryﬃndor’s sword bumping against his back")

relationships.description: Bellatrix is attacking Ron, as her knife flies across the room. ("as Bellatrix’s knife ﬂew across the room at the place where he was vanishing")
Dobby's hand is jerking in Harry's, suggesting Dobby may be trying to take control. ("Gryﬃndor’s sword bumping against his back: Dobby’s hand jerked in his")
